help.name: help
help.description: Sends the list of available commands.

options.name: commands
options.description: Sends the details about a command.

ip.name: ip
ip.description: Sends the server address of the Minecraft server.

site.name: site
site.description: Sends the website/vote link of the Minecraft server.

version.name: version
version.description: Sends the version of the Minecraft server.

motd.name: motd
motd.description: Sends the Minecraft Server's Message of the Day (MOTD).
motd.errorReply: :warning:  **`An error occurred while retrieving the Message of the Day (MOTD).`**

players.name: players
players.description: Sends the list of players who are currently online on the Minecraft server.
players.errorReply: :warning:  **`An error occurred while retrieving the online players list.`**

status.name: status
status.description: Sends the current status of the Minecraft server.
status.errorReply: :warning:  **`Unable to find the status of the server due to an error.`**

info.name: info
info.description: Sends the current information about the bot.

setstatus.name: setstatus
setstatus.description: Sets the status message of the Minecraft server in the current channel.
setstatus.errorReply: :warning:  **`Could not set the status message due to an error: {error}.`**
setstatus.enableFeature: **Please enable `auto Change Status` in the config to enable the status message feature.**
setstatus.checkingStatusCmdMsg: :arrows_clockwise: Checking the status and necessary info.
setstatus.statusMsgSuccess: :white_check_mark: **Status message is set successfully in {channel}. Message:** {messageLink}.
